definition: enough (sufficient)/enough (too much)/(coll.) (before adj.) really/(coll.) to reach by stretching out
many/much/often/a lot of/numerous/more/in excess/how (to what extent)/multi-/Taiwan pr. [duo2] when it means "how"
sentence/clause/phrase/classifier for phrases or lines of verse
to be capable of/to be able to/can
to have had enough of/to be fed up with/to have had one's fill of
lit. just the right flavor/just right/just the thing/excellent
to break even/to get one's money's worth
to be quite an ordeal/to be hard to bear
variant of 夠嗆|够呛[gou4 qiang4]
avid/eager for/longing for/to look forward to

sentences.english: The guy's depraved…Gets off on violating and humiliating all these women.
sentences.chinese: 這人夠墮落最喜歡侵犯和羞辱這些女人。

sentences.english: We are flexible at all times to meet and exceed customers' needs.
sentences.chinese: 我們總能夠靈活機動以保證滿足客戶的需求。

sentences.english: But Mr. Lea's being good enough to let them keep dragging on around here.
sentences.chinese: 但是李老爺讓他們在這裏苟延殘喘已經夠好心了。

sentences.english: The real question is whether China's stimulus is big enough?
sentences.chinese: 真正的問題是中國的刺激計劃是否夠規模？

sentences.english: Cricket cannot rival football in excitement.
sentences.chinese: 板球遠不如足球夠刺激。

sentences.english: He couldn't be careful enough on that upstroke.
sentences.chinese: 他揚起翅膀時，真是夠小心的了。

sentences.english: Don't dawdle over your clothing. You're so beautiful already.
sentences.chinese: 不要再在衣着上花費時間了，你已經夠漂亮的了。

sentences.english: Eg. I'm browned off with working so hard for so little money.
sentences.chinese: 工作這麼喫力，錢又這麼少，夠她受的。

sentences.english: You don't have a well- balanced diet. Have you been taking vitamin pills?
sentences.chinese: 我午飯通常只有夠喫一塊三明治和喝杯咖啡的時間。

sentences.english: Christmas comes but once a year.
She couldnot be more excellent anyway.
sentences.chinese: 無論如何，她已經夠優秀的了。

sentences.english: His wages are adequate to support three people.
sentences.chinese: 他的工資夠養活三口人。

sentences.english: We need to buy auto brake, please contact with us.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要夠購買汽車剎車片，請聯繫我們。

sentences.english: The family gets almost all the red meat it needs for a whole year during hunting season.
sentences.chinese: 狩獵季節他們一家打到的肉幾乎夠喫一年。

sentences.english: The tall man is strong enough to carry the heavy box.
sentences.chinese: 這個高個子男人夠強壯的了，能夠搬動那個重箱子。

sentences.english: If a relationship is strong enough, its no big deal for arguements or conflicts.
sentences.chinese: 假設一段關係夠穩定的話，爭持和牴觸只是小事。

definition: only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to be capable of/to be able to/can
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
so much/this much/how much?/this way/like this
at the minimum/at the very least
